name: Kiwai
description:
Kiwai is a co-op game where you either play as the sweet, loving Kiwai, or as his evil twin Kowoi. Kowoi loves to go on a rampage and destroy the city, forcing Kiwai to fix his mess! Play as Kiwai and fix after Kowoi's mess while also saving babies, cats, and whatever else Kowoi throws out of building windows! Or play as Kowoi and destroy the town's buildings as much as possible! Whoever wins is determined by whether the population is happy (Kiwai) or angry (Kowoi) at the end of the time limit!

Angela Hanna Goulene: Concept, 2D Designer, Game designer

Claudia Mc Arthur: 2D UI Designer

James McCafferty: Programmer

Jeffery Vuorela: 3D Artist

Chad Buck: Programmer

Nicolas Des Alliers: Programmer, Sound Designer, Composer

Martin Roeck: Level Design, Playtesting
